verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came יוֹסֵף֮ <WH3130> Then Joseph וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <WH5046> and told לְפַרְעֹה֒ <WH6547> Pharaoh וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said אָבִ֨י <WH1> My father וְאַחַ֜י <WH251> and my brethren וְצֹאנָ֤ם <WH6629> and their flocks וּבְקָרָם֙ <WH1241> and their herds וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לָהֶ֔ם בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> and all that they have are come out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וְהִנָּ֖ם <WH2005> are in בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and behold they [are] in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1657> of Goshen

וּמִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> some אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> of his brethren לָקַ֖ח <WH3947> And he took חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> [even] five אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> men וַיַּצִּגֵ֖ם <WH3322> and presented לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> them unto פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said פַּרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> unto his brethren מַה־ <WH4100> What מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶ֑ם <WH4639> act וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> said אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh רֹעֵ֥ה <WH7462> are shepherds צֹאן֙ <WH6629> cattle עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> Thy servants גַּם־ <WH1571> both אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we גַּם־ <WH1571> both אֲבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1> both we [and] also our fathers

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> They said אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> moreover unto Pharaoh לָג֣וּר <WH1481> For to sojourn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <WH776> in the land בָּאנוּ֒ <WH935> are we come כִּי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֣ין <WH369> there מִרְעֶ֗ה <WH4829> have no pasture לַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> for their flocks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> your לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> for thy servants כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָבֵ֥ד <WH3515> [is] sore הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> for the famine בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> Now יֵֽשְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> dwell נָ֥א <WH4994> please עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> now therefore we pray thee let thy servants בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1657> of Goshen

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> unto Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אָבִ֥יךָ <WH1> Thy father וְאַחֶ֖יךָ <WH251> and thy brethren בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> are come אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> The land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> [is] before thee הִ֔וא <WH1931> he בְּמֵיטַ֣ב <WH4315> in the best הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land הוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> to dwell אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> thy father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחֶ֑יךָ <WH251> and brethren יֵשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> let them dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land גֹּ֔שֶׁן <WH1657> of Goshen וְאִם־ <WH518> and if יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> know וְיֶשׁ־ <WH3426> any בָּם֙ אַנְשֵׁי־ <WH376> men חַ֔יִל <WH2428> of activity וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ם <WH7760> among them then make them שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> rulers מִקְנֶ֖ה <WH4735> over my cattle עַל־ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לִֽי׃

וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> brought in יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> יַֽעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> Jacob אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֖הוּ <WH5975> and set him לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> and Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> Pharaoh
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> unto Jacob כַּמָּ֕ה <WH4100> How יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> age שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8141> years חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> age

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> And Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> The days שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> of the years מְגוּרַ֔י <WH4033> of my pilgrimage שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> and thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> [are] an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> few וְרָעִ֗ים <WH7451> and evil הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> have been יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> have the days שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> of the years חַיַּ֔י <WH2416> of my life וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הִשִּׂ֗יגוּ <WH5381> been and have not attained אֶת־ <WH853> יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> unto the days שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> of the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> of the life אֲבֹתַ֔י <WH1> of my fathers בִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> in the days מְגוּרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4033> of their pilgrimage
וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> and went out מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> from before פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> Pharaoh

וַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> placed יוֹסֵף֮ <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֣יו <WH1> his father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָיו֒ <WH251> and his brethren וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH14> would לָהֶ֤ם אֲחֻזָּה֙ <WH272> them a possession בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּמֵיטַ֥ב <WH4315> in the best הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land רַעְמְסֵ֑ס <WH7486> of Rameses כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> as Pharaoh

וַיְכַלְכֵּ֤ל <WH3557> nourished יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֣יו <WH1> his father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> and his brethren וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> household אָבִ֑יו <WH1> and all his father's לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> with bread לְפִ֥י <WH6310> according הַטָּֽף׃ <WH2945> to [their] families

וְלֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> And [there was] no bread אֵין֙ <WH369> now there בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in all the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because כָבֵ֥ד <WH3515> sore הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> for the famine מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [was] very וַתֵּ֜לַהּ <WH3856> fainted אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> so that the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt וְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and [all] the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> by reason הָרָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> of the famine

וַיְלַקֵּ֣ט <WH3950> gathered up יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> all the money הַנִּמְצָ֤א <WH4672> that was found בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt וּבְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan בַּשֶּׁ֖בֶר <WH7668> for the corn אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵ֣ם <WH1992> they שֹׁבְרִ֑ים <WH7666> which they bought וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> brought יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> and Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> the money בֵּ֥יתָה <WH1004> house פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> into Pharaoh's

וַיִּתֹּ֣ם <WH8552> failed הַכֶּ֗סֶף <WH3701> And when money מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <WH4714> of Egypt וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and in the land כְּנַעַן֒ <WH3667> of Canaan וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <WH935> came כָל־ <WH3605> all מִצְרַ֨יִם <WH4713> Egyptian אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֤ף <WH3130> unto Joseph לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> and said הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> Give לָּ֣נוּ לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> us bread וְלָ֥מָּה <WH4100> why נָמ֖וּת <WH4191> for why should we die נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5048> about כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָפֵ֖ס <WH656> faileth כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> in thy presence? for the money

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph הָב֣וּ <WH3051> Give מִקְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4735> your cattle וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> and I will give לָכֶ֖ם בְּמִקְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4735> you for your cattle אִם־ <WH518> since אָפֵ֖ס <WH656> fail כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> if money

וַיָּבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> And they brought אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵיהֶם֮ <WH4735> their cattle אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵף֒ <WH3130> unto Joseph וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶם֩ יוֹסֵ֨ף <WH3130> and Joseph לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> them bread בַּסּוּסִ֗ים <WH5483> [in exchange] for horses וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> and for the cattle הַצֹּ֛אן <WH6629> and for the flocks וּבְמִקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> for all their cattle הַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> of the herds וּבַחֲמֹרִ֑ים <WH2543> and for the asses וַיְנַהֲלֵ֤ם <WH5095> and he fed בַּלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> them with bread בְּכָל־ <WH3605> for all מִקְנֵהֶ֔ם <WH4735> their livestock בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> for that year הַהִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וַתִּתֹּם֮ <WH8552> was ended הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> When that year הַהִוא֒ <WH1931> they וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> they came אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> also hath בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> unto him the second וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> and said לוֹ֙ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is nothing נְכַחֵ֣ד <WH3582> unto him We will not hide מֵֽאֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> [it] from my lord כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo תַּ֣ם <WH8552> is spent הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> how that our money וּמִקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> our herds הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> of cattle אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> my lord לֹ֤א <WH3808> is nothing נִשְׁאַר֙ <WH7604> there is not ought left לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> in the sight אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> of my lord בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> because אִם־ <WH518> lo גְּוִיָּתֵ֖נוּ <WH1472> but our bodies וְאַדְמָתֵֽנוּ׃ <WH127> and our lands

לָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why נָמ֣וּת <WH4191> Wherefore shall we die לְעֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> before thine eyes גַּם־ <WH1571> both אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> we גַּ֣ם <WH1571> both אַדְמָתֵ֔נוּ <WH127> us and our land קְנֵֽה־ <WH7069> attain אֹתָ֥נוּ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַדְמָתֵ֖נוּ <WH127> and we and our land בַּלָּ֑חֶם <WH3899> for bread וְנִֽהְיֶ֞ה <WH1961> become אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <WH587> we וְאַדְמָתֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH127> that the land עֲבָדִ֣ים <WH5650> will be servants לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וְתֶן־ <WH5414> and give זֶ֗רַע <WH2233> [us] seed וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ <WH2421> that we may live וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not נָמ֔וּת <WH4191> and not die וְהָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> and our land לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵשָֽׁם׃ <WH3456> be not desolate

וַיִּ֨קֶן <WH7069> bought יוֹסֵ֜ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַדְמַ֤ת <WH127> all the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> for Pharaoh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מָכְר֤וּ <WH4376> sold מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4713> Egyptian אִ֣ישׁ <WH582> another שָׂדֵ֔הוּ <WH7704> his field כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because חָזַ֥ק <WH2388> prevailed עֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and הָרָעָ֑ב <WH7458> because the famine וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> became הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> over them so the land לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> became Pharaoh's

וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And as for the people הֶעֱבִ֥יר <WH5674> he removed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לֶעָרִ֑ים <WH5892> them to cities מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> from [one] end גְבוּל־ <WH1366> of the borders מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְעַד־ <WH5704> against קָצֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7097> even to the [other] end

רַ֛ק <WH7535> but אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> Only the land הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> of the priests לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not קָנָ֑ה <WH7069> bought he כִּי֩ <WH3588> for חֹ֨ק <WH2706> had a portion לַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> not for the priests מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> [assigned them] of Pharaoh וְאָֽכְל֤וּ <WH398> and did eat אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקָּם֙ <WH2706> their portion אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶם֙ פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> which Pharaoh עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֕ן <WH3651> after that לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not מָכְר֖וּ <WH4376> them wherefore they sold אֶת־ <WH853> אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <WH127> not their lands

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> Then Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> unto the people הֵן֩ <WH2005> Behold קָנִ֨יתִי <WH7069> bought אֶתְכֶ֥ם <WH853> הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> you this day וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַדְמַתְכֶ֖ם <WH127> and your land לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> for Pharaoh הֵֽא־ <WH1887> lo לָכֶ֣ם זֶ֔רַע <WH2233> [here is] seed וּזְרַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH2232> for you and ye shall sow אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> the land

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become בַּתְּבוּאֹ֔ת <WH8393> And it shall come to pass in the increase וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <WH5414> that ye shall give חֲמִישִׁ֖ית <WH2549> the fifth לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> [part] unto Pharaoh וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> and four הַיָּדֹ֡ת <WH3027> parts יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶם֩ לְזֶ֨רַע <WH2233> shall be your own for seed הַשָּׂדֶ֧ה <WH7704> of the field וּֽלְאָכְלְכֶ֛ם <WH400> and for your food וְלַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֖ם <WH1004> and for them of your households וְלֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> and for food לְטַפְּכֶֽם׃ <WH2945> for your little ones
